questions.question: A series of green flashes directed at an aircraft means respectively (in flight / on the ground)
A steady red light directed at an aircraft means (in flight / on the ground)

answers.1: give way to other aircraft and continue circling;-----------stop.
answers.2: give way to other aircraft and continue circling;-----------taxi clear of landing area in use.
answers.3: airport unsafe do not land;---------------------------------taxi clear of landing area in use.

questions.question: A series of red flashes directed at an aircraft means respectively (in flight / on the ground)

answers.1: airport unsafe, do not land;------------------------taxi clear of landing area in use.
answers.2: give way to other aircraft and continue circling;---stop.
answers.3: do not land for time being;-------------------------return to starting point on airport.
answers.4: you are in prohibited area, alter course;-----------stop.

answers.4: taxi clear of landing area in use.
